Class SFDCPlugins

public class SFDCPlugins

This class contains plugins for use in the ESAPI. The DescribeInfoCache plugin provides caching functionality for describe info.

Nested Class Summary
public interface SFDCPlugins.SFDCIDescribeInfoCache
          This interface defines the methods for a describe info cache implementation.
